samalingika washayen wadi washayenma apayojanayata lakwanne pirimi daruwanya.lokaye sama pirimi daruwan thun denakugen ek ayek lingikawa apayojanayata lakwana bawa soyagena atha.wisheshayen mema thathwaya dakunu aasiyawa ha thunwana lokaye ratawal athara bahulaya.sanwardhitha ratawal walada samalingika lama apayojanayan warthawe.amarikawe sidukala samikshanayakata anuwa erata wayasa awurudu 18ta adu piriimi daruwan atharin 16% pamana lingika apayojanayanta goduruwi atha.sanwardhanaya wemin pawathina ratawala mewan lingika apayojana bahulawa siduwuwada nithiya iridiyata yame prawanathawa ithamath aduya.kuda pirimi daruwan wadihiti purushayan wisin balahathkarayen ho rawatima magin lingika kriyawanta yomukaragani.pasuwa owunta tharnanaya kirimen ho biya ganwimen nihadabawa laba gani.pasal wayase pasuwana pirimi daruwan sama wayas yahaluwan ha wadihiti sisun ho wadihiti purushayan athin apayojanayata lakwe.mehi prathipalayak lesa owunta lingikawa sampreshanayawana roga waladimata ida thibe.atham wita barapathala lingika apayojanayak nam lingika awayawa ho gudaya thuwalawim walata lakwe.apayojanaya lakwana daruwata athiwana kayika menma manasika balapamada barapathalaya.sama lingika washayen gahanu lamunwada apayojanayata lakwana awastha atha.
